summary: This is a hand done HD reimagining of the ancient artifact Spellbreaker.
descriptionHtml:
~FILE FIXED!~

Note: Screenshots taken with Realvision ENB, some colors may appear more or less saturated to you, depending on what you have setup.

After 4 days of toiling and tweaking and redoing, I finally am proud to present this HD retexture of Spellbreaker. I've done spellbreaker before, but that was two years ago and I did not have a HD texture to work with as a base at the time.

I tried to keep the texture fidelity as high as I could while providing a lovely piece of eye candy. The textures are all in 2048x2048 (except the environment map) though should not cause any slow downs that I am aware of. So, enjoy!

- Will be adding 1024x1024 variant for people with a high-mod count/ lower powered gpu's.

Without further ado, all you need to do is download and install it, manually or through NMM ( Best option). The textures are fully compatible with Dual Sheathe Redux, they are not compatible with any other mod that changes Spellbreakers textures.

Alternate Bronze version -does not- require the main file, however I reccomend the main file due to the included larger mesh, which shows off the details of this retexture a little better than the default.


~PLEASE DO NOT UPLOAD THIS ANYWHERE ELSE WITHOUT MY EXPLICIT PERMISSION, THANK YOU~
author: Nightshade
